title: Richmond, Indiana
summary: Richmond /ˈrɪtʃmənd/ is a city in east central Indiana, United States of America, bordering the state of Ohio. It is the county seat of Wayne County, and is part of the Dayton, Ohio metropolitan area.[6] In the 2010 census, the city had a population of 36,812. Situated largely within Wayne Township, its area includes a non-contiguous portion in nearby Boston Township, where Richmond Municipal Airport is currently located. Richmond is approximately 45 Minutes away from Dayton, Ohio City Limits, lying near the Indiana / Ohio state line.
